text: Adare avaru, ‘‘nam'modeya, nam'ma prayanada gurigala naduvana antaravannu heccisu’’ endu prarthisidaru. Hige avaru tam'ma mele tave akramavesagidaru. Konege navu avarannu kathegalagisi bittevu mattu navu avarannu sampurna vicchidragolisi bittevu. Pratiyobba sahanasila, krtajnanige idaralli khandita pathavide
